alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 11:40AM EDT until March 31 at 7:24PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Oconee affecting Wilkinson, Washington and Johnson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oconee River near Oconee. * WHEN...From late tonight to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23 feet, Moderate flooding continues. Portions of the Old Balls Ferry Road leading to the boat ramp becomes flooded with a foot of water or more. The entire dirt parking lot near the boat ramp is under three to five feet of water. Extensive flooding of the woodlands near the river continues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EDT Monday the stage was 12.5 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 22.4 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
